Q_DESC:
To write a program in which the user has to perform operations in a linked list.
The user inputs two linked list one with size three and another with size two. The respective position of the elements are summed up and the resultant sum list is formed. The sum list is linked list representation of addition of two input numbers. It is not allowed to modify the lists. Also, not allowed to use explicit extra space (Hint: Use Recursion).
INPUT:
9 9 9// linked list 2
 1 8//linked list 2
OUTPUT:
1 0 1 7
